name: certificate-sharing
description: Script otomatis untuk berbagi akses sertifikat di Google Drive

scripts.clean:exe: rm -f build/*.exe build.exe || true; mkdir -p build
scripts.build:win: npm run clean:exe && pkg unified-monitor.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/certificate-monitor-win.exe && pkg index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/certificate-sharing-win.exe && pkg map-folders.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/map-folders-win.exe

author: Freelance Script
